      • calculateMousePosition

        private void calculateMousePosition()
        Calculates the mouse position concerning fullscreen, window borders, windows, etc. When the mouse is in a window, the position does not change (to prevent wrong clicks on other controls/tools).

      • renderInit

        private void renderInit()
        Initializes the rendering anc cleares the screen.

      • renderGameScreen

        private void renderGameScreen()
        Updates the game screen and draws the control drawer.

      • renderWindows

        private void renderWindows()
        Draws all windows that are in the __windowList.

        private void renderFPSDisplay()
        Draws the FPS-display with the frames per second given by Gdx.

      • renderCursor

        private void renderCursor()
        Draws the cursor based on the operating system (if windows: cursor is drawn manually).

      • touchDown

        public boolean touchDown(int screenX,
                int screenY,
                int pointer,
                int button)
        Is executed when the user clicks with the mouse. The click-hirarchy: 1.) Check if a control has been clicked. If yes: return If no : do check 2 2.) Check if a window has been clicked. If yes: Close the window if needed and then return If no : do check 3 3.) Forward click to the game screen.
        Specified by:
        touchDown in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

      • touchUp

        public boolean touchUp(int screenX,
              int screenY,
              int pointer,
              int button)
        Specified by:
        touchUp in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

        Specified by:

      • __closeWindow

        public static void __closeWindow(Window window)
        Closes a specific window (please do window.close() instead).
        Parameters:
        window - The window that should be closed.

      • registerControl

        public static void registerControl(ControlElement control)
        Registers a control in the control manager. If the control already is registered, it'll be deleted.
        Parameters:
        control - The control to add/remove.

      • setSettings

        private void setSettings()
        Reads the settings from the settings.cfg and sets them to the variables of METRO.
